title: SBA Communications targets up to 800 new tower builds in 2025, aligning with Millicom partnership

Earnings Call Insights: SBA Communications (NASDAQ:SBAC) Q4 2024

Management View

  • CEO Brendan Cavanagh noted a strong finish to 2024, with results in line or slightly ahead of estimates despite unfavorable foreign exchange rates. Domestic carrier activity increased, driven by 5G mid-band coverage expansion
